Text: Trump and some of his advisers calculated that he should not speak to the nation because he had nothing to say.He had no tangible policy or action to announce, nor did he feel an urgent motivation to try to bring people together. So he stayed silent. https://t.co/1Yf2biYnBC

U.S. security forces pulling anti-COVID19 facemasks on protestors ; journalists to directly pepper spray them in the face. This type of attack causes severe respiratory damage that can prove deadly during a pandemic. #Anonymous #ICantBreathe #GeorgeFloyd  https://t.co/JrHmBVMVQS

This is why a #SecondWave is inevitable... 👇🏻 #COVID19.#CoronaVirus is highly infectious. It remains invisible for 7 days so people spread it whilst thinking they're healthy.#DailyBriefings #SecondPeak #NotMovingOnTillDomHasGone https://t.co/Q56nK3o8km

Pleased that @WHOAFRO experts deployed to São Tomé ; Príncipe to support #COVID19 response on the islands arrived last night. This demonstrates the importance of ensuring humanitarian access to Member States, something WHO is advocating for across the region. One fight.

The president's call w/ govs is something, per audio. Trump is angry and railing on the governors using words like "weak" "jerks" and "fools" to describe them. His message is you have to "fight" and it's about the "radical left."

Why would Trump send in the National Guard when Democrat politicians and police chiefs are issuing stand-down orders to their own police?It's just a trap so he takes the blame for the violence the Democrats are fostering.

Andy Burnham on the radio again. Fascinating to see how he has become almost spokesperson for English devolution during #Covid19. Feels like pandemic could really change UK's already uncertain constitutional arrangements.

ANTIFA isn't an organization.ANTIFA has NEVER killed a single person.ANTIFA simply means "anti-fascism," it's a fairly small, highly decentralized movement.What Trump is trying to do is label anyone who speaks out against him a terrorist, which is what all dictators do.

While Trump is telling Governors they're weak if they don't use brute force, Biden is meeting with Black leaders to discuss how to make systemic change. The election is less than 6 months away. Remember these moments. https://t.co/PaNC5jbIM8

JUST IN: President Trump unloads on the nation's governors on a call, calls on them to step up enforcement: "You have to dominate, if you don't dominate you're wasting your time. They're going to run over you, you're going to look like a bunch of jerks. You have to dominate."
